short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will calculate stamp duty on property sites such as right move.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly calculate stamp duty cost for UK properties. Using a property site such as right move (or any other property site).

How to use:

1. Double click on any money value
2. An icon will appear
3. Click the icon
4. Stamp duty is calculated
